announcements.title: Maple Sugar Festival
announcements.description: Celebrate the maple sugaring season at KNC's 59th annual Maple Sugar Festival. Tickets are on sale now with early bird discounts!

announcements.title: Summer Camp Early Bird Registration
announcements.description: KNC Campers enjoy weekly themes, take on new adventures, make new friends, and learn to have a positive impact on the natural world.

announcements.title: Save the Date!
announcements.subtitle2: Robin Wall Kimmerer at Chenery Auditorium July 12
announcements.description: Mark your calendars for this highly-anticipated exhibit and Terry Todd International Speaker Series event.

announcements.title: Sponsor a KNC Event in 2024
announcements.description: Whether your business operates locally, nationally, or globally, a sponsorship places you in front of our 5,600+ membership base and the greater Kalamazoo community.
